text: (â€˜â€˜ivar unmaiyana tutartan enru catci colvatarku) avarukkaka oru vanavar anuppappata ventama?'' Enru avarkal kurukinranar. (Avarkal virumpukirapati) nam oru vanavarai anuppi vaittiruntal, (avarkalin) kariyam mutivu perrirukkum. Piraku, (atil) avarkalukku avakacam kitaittirukkatu. (Utane avarkal alintirupparkal)
